BackstoryDef.title: mad scientist
BackstoryDef.description: Stripped of [PAWN_possessive] life's work and exiled after [PAWN_possessive] unethical experiments on the survivors of the Callos IX incident were published, [PAWN_nameDef] learned the skills necessary to survive in the outer rim.\n\nContinuing [PAWN_possessive] research with nothing left to lose, [PAWN_pronoun] made minions to carry out the tasks that bored him.
